error.message: Call to deprecated function search_mark_for_reindex(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\search\SearchIndex::markForReindex() instead.

Parameter $entity_manager of method Drupal\page_manager_search\Plugin\Search\PageManagerSearch::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function search_index(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\search\SearchIndex::index() instead.
Call to deprecated function search_index_clear(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\search\SearchIndex::clear() instead.
Call to deprecated function search_mark_for_reindex(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\search\SearchIndex::markForReindex() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to page_manager_search.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
